did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Microfilm of letters, speeches, and newspaper clippings; Also one undated photograph of McGinnies, and two programs.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Joseph McGinnies was a member of the New York State Assembly from 1915-1934 and speaker of the Assembly from 1925-1934.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Microfilm of letters, speeches, and newspaper clippings dealing with New York State and Chautauqua County politics, mainly during the years McGinnies was a member of the Assembly. Also, one undated photograph of McGinnies in the company of Mayor James J. Walker, and two programs for a Chautauqua County testimonial dinner held in McGinnies' honor.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Joseph McGinnies papers, #1943. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p: Related collection:Chautauqua County Republican Party Committee. Minute Book, #1945.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
